contentrichtext.text: '''Boycott''' may refer to: ugly cheese * A [[boycott]], an organized ostracism as a means of protest * [[Boycott, Buckinghamshire]], a village in the United Kingdom * ''[[Boycott (film)]]'', a 1985 film directed by Mohsen Makhmalbaf * ''Boycott'' (2001 film), a 2001 HBO television movie starring Jeffrey Wright * [[Charles Boycott]] (1832â€“1897), a British land agent whose ostracism by his local community in Ireland gave rise to the word ''boycott'' * [[Geoffrey Boycott]] (born 1940), English cricketer * [[Rosie Boycott]] (born 1951), British journalist * [[Boycott (novel)]], a 2012 novel by Colin C. Murphy {{disambig}}
